DOC.brief_summary: This study compare maternal neonatal outcome patient PPROM manage home versus manage hospital , half patient manage home half manage inpatient .
DOC.brief_title: Preterm Premature Rupture Membranes , Outpatient Management v Inpatient Management
DOC.detailed_description: Now current practice manage patient PPROM hospital , however know yet whether practice well outpatient management regard maternal neonatal outcome . There recent evidence home management PPROM safe mother neonate , home management also convenient less expense .
DOC.criteria: 1 . PPROM gestational age 27 34 week 2 . Cephalic presentation 3 . Clear amniotic fluid 4 . Oral temperature > 38 C 5 . Near distance hospital ( patient reach hospital within one hour ) 6 . Home environment safe amenable rest , availability family support sister mother help patient home . 7 . Maternal fetal condition remain stable hospitalization 72 hour 1 . Patient equivocal diagnosis rupture membranes 2. advanced labor 3. intrauterine infection 4. vaginal bleed 5. non reassure fetal heart rate .
